data.text:
Wipro Consumer Care’s international businesses are a part of the Wipro Consumer Care group, headquartered in Bangalore, India, and boasting a rich history of over 75 years. With a culture of trust, diversity, inclusion, and an unwavering drive for growth, our group has a global workforce of over 10,000 employees spread across more than 19 countries. Notably, 59% of our workforce consists of women.

The company specialize in the manufacturing and marketing of personal care products, bringing targeted brands to millions of consumers across continents. Currently, our operations span many countries, including significant operations in India, Malaysia, China, Vietnam, Philippines, Middle East, Indonesia, and South Africa, among a presence in many other markets.

Our Mission Statement

Our mission is to achieve a prominent position in the Household and Personal Care markets as a marketer of high-quality and innovative brands. We aim to enhance the lifestyle of our consumers, provide a favorable return on investment for our shareholders, and empower our employees to realize their personal ambitions.

Building Brands

Central to our growth strategy is the creation and continual development of brands and new products. Our businesses invest significantly in the process of creating new brands, continuously refining, and improving existing ones. This critical process is led by our marketing teams and supported by robust integrated product development, production, marketing, and sales operations.

Our extensive portfolio comprises over 51 proprietary brands sold in over 50+ countries, catering to diverse consumer needs across markets

New Product Development

To drive innovation, we have established advanced research and development facilities in Malaysia, China, Vietnam, and Malaysia. These centers enable us to develop our own products. Through rigorous testing and consumer research, we ensure that our new products fully meet consumer requirements. Stringent safety checks are conducted, including the regulations set by the Federal Drug Authority (FDA), European Economic Community (EEC)/COLIPA, British Pharmacopoeia (BP), the Cosmetics, Toiletries and Fragrance Association (CFTA), ASEAN Cosmetic Directive for ASEAN countries and the National Medical Products Administration China (NMPA).

Distribution Reach

We have an extensive sales and distribution network that ensures convenient access to our products for consumers across various markets. with a retail footprint spanning hypermarkets, supermarkets, department stores, mini markets, general provision shops, convenience stores, and pharmacies, we strive to make our products readily available. Additionally, we deploy sales promoters in many markets who are stationed in retail outlets to increase awareness, encourage product trial, and provide comprehensive advice to consumers.

International Businesses

Wipro Consumer Care and Lighting is among the fastest-growing companies in the FMCG space with 14 global acquisitions, over 50% of the company revenues is accounted for by our international businesses. Through our international acquisitions of personal care and home care brands, we have gained expertise which has enabled knowledge transfer and faster turnaround on our new product development.
